BackstoryDef.title: Hypnotism Learner
BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was introduced to hypnosis by a popular movie, and strove to learn it. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to put [PAWN_pronoun] friends under with basic crystal hypnosis and change small parts of their personality, but always attempted too radical changes in further experiments to truly master Hypnotism.

BackstoryDef.title: Trauma Child
BackstoryDef.baseDescription: When [PAWN_nameDef] was younger, they were abused by their teachers, relatives, and fellow students. [PAWN_pronoun]'s parents took [PAWN_pronoun] to a psychologist, and was put through hypnotherapy.

BackstoryDef.title: Medicine Tweaker
BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was training to be a hunter for [PAWN_pronoun] tribe before [PAWN_pronoun] found a cave full of mind-altering mushrooms. [PAWN_pronoun] used them to become the leader until a space pirate group attacked [PAWN_pronoun] village. With no one aware enough to fight back effectively, [PAWN_pronoun] ran.
